    • Uses of Mob in com.cscguru.client.entities

      Method parameters in com.cscguru.client.entities with type arguments of type Mob 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.attack(java.util.ArrayList<Mob> mobs)
      Player attempts to attack on-screen mobs if and only if the attack time exceeds his attack speed and if the player's current hitbox (bumper) intersects with a mob.

      java.util.ArrayList<Mob> Camera.getMobsOnScreen()
      Returns an array list containing all the mobs currently on the screen.
